item.title: Jordan Wigner Transformation Made Simple
item.description: The Jordan-Wigner transformation turns fermionic creation and annihilation operators to a combination of spin operators. I had a hard time undersating how it works until yesterday I came across the notes in this place. The notes list the definitions and the algebra of the “string+spin” operators. The notes themself however still didn’t make me fully fully understand why the things work like this. But fortunately I worked out some kronneck products of spin operators when I was developing the fishbonett package.
